posts.post_content:
Hi all, I have three "tough but not really that tough" baseball cards for trade. I'm not into t206's at all, and they just collect dust at the bottom of my desk. I feel like someone else would appreciate them more. Would love to trade these towards an e104, e107, w600, and if not possibly cash.  please send emails to piannicelli89 @ yahoo.com if interested in scans.

AB 460 Camnitz - raw, good to vg
AB 350 Krause PSA 1 - clean back, very small pin hole
Cycle 350 Chappelle  - raw, good to vg
Is it possible to get a scan of the AB 460 Camnitz?  Send to [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url]. Thanks, Bill
